items.title: Flipkart’s Super.money teams up with Kotak811 to make India’s free UPI payments pay
items.description: The partnership aims to issue about 2 million fixed-deposit-backed credit cards in the next 12 months.

items.title: LG Uplus is latest South Korean telco to confirm cybersecurity incident
items.description: Korean telecom giant LG Uplus is the third major phone provider in the past six months to report a cybersecurity incident.

items.title: Here are the 5 Startup Battlefield finalists at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.description: After two days full of live demos and pitches, it's time to announce the five finalists at this year's Startup Battlefield.
